TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit UserScopedSettingAttribute extends System.Configuration.SettingAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class UserScopedSettingAttribute Inherits SettingAttribute
public ref class UserScopedSettingAttribute sealed : System::Configuration::SettingAttribute

summary.span: 指定应用程序设置组或属性对于应用程序的每个用户包含不同的值。

span.span: Specifies that an application settings group or property contains distinct values for each user of an application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序设置属性具有在应用程序或用户级别所基于的作用域。Application settings properties have a scope that is based either at the application or the user level. 顾名思义，应用程序范围的属性提供的应用程序中，所有用户统一值，而用户范围的属性具有专用的每个用户的应用程序的值。As the categories imply, application-scoped properties present uniform values to all users of the application, whereas user-scoped properties have dedicated values for each user of the application. 指示属性应被视为一个用户级别设置，并且应相应地做出相应的存储的决策通过设置提供程序。The indicates that a property should be considered a user level setting, and that appropriate storage decisions should be made accordingly by the settings provider. 需要为每个应用程序设置属性的作用域属性。A scope attribute is required for each application settings property. 如果未对属性应用或，通过设置提供程序将忽略此属性，则不会序列化。If a property is not applied with either a or , the property is ignored by the settings provider—it is not serialized. 它是无效的但是，将这两个属性应用于相同的设置属性。It is invalid, however, to apply both attributes to the same settings property. 这类尝试将导致引发。Such an attempt will cause a to be thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将应用于的所有四个属性`FormSettings`包装器类，该类派生自类。The following code example demonstrates the use of the applied to all four properties of the `FormSettings` wrapper class, which is derived from the class. 此类用于保留位置、 大小、 背景色和窗体的文本。This class is used to persist the location, size, background color, and text of form. 完整的代码示例所示类概述。The full code example is listed in the class overview. [!code-cpp[AppSettingsSample#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/cpp/AppSettingsSample.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[AppSettingsSample#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/CS/AppSettingsSample.cs#9)] [!code-vb[AppSettingsSample#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/VB/Form1.vb#9)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须具有单个作用域属性以使其以识别并序列化设置提供程序向其应用每个应用程序设置属性。Each application settings property must be applied with a single scope attribute in order for it to be recognized and serialized by the settings provider.
